query: query ConsumerSearchQuery($query: HomeSearchCriteria!, $limit: Int, $offset: Int, $sort: [SearchAPISort], $bucket: SearchAPIBucket) { home_search(query: $query, sort: $sort, limit: $limit, offset: $offset, bucket: $bucket) { costar_counts { costar_total non_costar_total } total count properties: results { property_id listing_id list_price list_price_max list_price_min permalink price_reduced_amount matterport has_specials virtual_tours { href } status list_date lead_attributes { lead_type is_premium_ldp } pet_policy { cats dogs dogs_small dogs_large } other_listings { rdc{ listing_id, status } } flags { is_pending } photos(limit: 2, https: true) { href } primary_photo(https: true) { href } advertisers { office { name phones { number type primary trackable ext } } phones { number type primary trackable ext } rental_management { fulfillment_id customer_set name logo href } } flags { is_new_listing } location { address { line city coordinate { lat lon } country state_code postal_code } county { name fips_code } } description { beds beds_max beds_min baths_min baths_max baths_consolidated garage garage_min garage_max sqft sqft_max sqft_min name sub_type type year_built } units { availability { date } description { baths_consolidated beds sqft } list_price } branding { type photo name } source { id community_id type feed_type } details { category text parent_category } products { products brand_name } } } }
